description: Police and prosecutors rule out racism, but activists ask if hate crimes are being properly investigated.
title: Danish murder on Bornholm island raises tension in race debate
title_page: Danish murder on Bornholm island raises tension in race debate - BBC News
maintext: "It's a very serious problem. We see it in the immigration and in the ghetto laws here, we see it in the refugee camp. We see how people can't get a job," she says.
